program main

   implicit none

   integer, parameter :: maxn = 100010

   integer :: n, i, val, ans1

   integer, dimension(0:100009) :: vo, ve, vt

   integer, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: dp

   character(len=20) :: s

   integer :: len_s, M = 1000000007

   ! First part: compute ans1

   read*, n

   integer :: v(maxn)

   read*, (v(i), i=1,n)

   ! Initialize vo, ve, vt to 0 (they are already 0 in Fortran, but better to set explicitly?)

   do i = 0, 100009

      vo(i) = 0

      ve(i) = 0

      vt(i) = 0

   end do

   do i = 1, n

      val = v(i)

      vt(val) = vt(val) + 1

      if (mod(i-1,2) == 0) then

         ve(val) = ve(val) + 1

      else

         vo(val) = vo(val) + 1

      end if

   end do

   ! Sort the arrays in descending order

   call sort_and_reverse(vo)

   call sort_and_reverse(ve)

   call sort_and_reverse(vt)

   ! Compute ans1

   if (vo(0) + ve(0) == vt(0)) then

      ans1 = min( n - vo(0) - ve(1), n - vo(1) - ve(0) )

   else

      ans1 = n - vo(0) - ve(0)

   end if

   ! Convert ans1 to string s

   write(s, '(i0)') ans1

   len_s = len_trim(s)

   ! Second part: compute ans2 using s

   allocate( dp(0:len_s, 0:1) )

   dp = 0

   dp(0,0) = 1

   do i = 1, len_s

      character(len=1) :: c = s(i:i)

      if (c == '0') then

         dp(i,0) = dp(i-1,0)

         dp(i,1) = dp(i-1,1)

      else

         dp(i,1) = mod( dp(i-1,0) + dp(i-1,1), M )

      end if

      if (c == '0') then

         dp(i,1) = mod( dp(i,1) + 2*dp(i-1,1), M )

      else

         dp(i,0) = mod( dp(i,0) + 2*dp(i-1,0), M )

         dp(i,1) = mod( dp(i,1) + 2*dp(i-1,1), M )

      end if

      ! Apply mod again to ensure within M

      dp(i,0) = mod(dp(i,0), M)

      dp(i,1) = mod(dp(i,1), M)

   end do

   integer :: result = mod( dp(len_s,0) + dp(len_s,1), M )

   print*, result

   deallocate(dp)

contains

   subroutine sort_and_reverse(arr)

      integer, dimension(0:100009), intent(inout) :: arr

      call sort(arr)  ! sorts in ascending order

      integer :: temp, j

      do j = 0, (size(arr)-1)/2

         temp = arr(j)

         arr(j) = arr(size(arr)-1 -j)

         arr(size(arr)-1 -j) = temp

      end do

   end subroutine

end program main
